pages.text: Unique anvils that allow to repair stuff without Experience

pages.text: An anvil that repair tools with some catalysts

pages.title: BlazeGold Anvil
pages.text: An anvil that repair items using high temperature fluids

pages.text: An anvil that repair items using Forge Energy (FE) like Celestigem Anvil
Also when added a coolant , it will repair it based on (coolant efficiency) / 100 x (total damage) that item can recieve more that 1000 foreach tick or $(bold)will completly repair$()
